description:
*This is not a development course*

Learn how to use iOS 7 in 1 hour. This short hour tutorial series will teach you what you need to know in iOS7 this short tutorial series is compact and will give you the most amount of information in the shortest amount of time. Learn all of the new stuff apple has added and learn some neat tips and tricks
title: Learn how to use iOS7 for your iPhone in 1 hour
